objectives: Students will discuss work and career using Neutral/Standard register language
Students will engage with Fantasy themed scenarios related to work and career
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of neutral level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining work and career content with Fantasy narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore work and career through a Fantasy lens using Neutral/Standard language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a magical or fantastical situation involving work and career

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice neutral register vocabulary related to work and career in a fantasy context
Students engage in fantasy themed role-play about work and career using neutral register
Students create original fantasy themed content about work and career in neutral register

discussion_questions: How would you describe work and career in a Fantasy scenario?
What magical or enchanted might be involved in work and career?
Can you create a Fantasy story about work and career?
How does work and career change when viewed through a Fantasy perspective?
What neutral register expressions would you use to discuss this fantasy scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Fantasy situation involving work and career
roles: Character A: Using neutral register in fantasy context
Character B: Responding in neutral register within fantasy theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Neutral/Standard throughout: Standard professional communication
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Fantasy theme: Magic, mythical creatures, imaginary worlds

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Neutral/Standard register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Fantasy themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of neutral register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
